name: Demo Scenario (2 min)
description: Two-minute smoke-test scenario for event wiring, news handling, fair-value drift, and automatic run completion.

name: Macro Crosswinds (15 min)
description: 15-minute multi-asset macro event with sector rotation, commodity shocks, and risk regime shifts.

name: Macro Rotation (15 min)
description: CPI shock, rate repricing, energy spike, then relief rally. Designed for portfolio/risk discipline.

name: Test (2 min)
description: Two-minute smoke test for joins, news feed, fair value drift, and run completion.
